results.1-1: Roll twice and take 2 drawbacks. Ignore any rolls that include 1.
results.2-4: You deal [[/r 10d6[fire]]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] that must include yourself.
results.8-10: When you take an action with the manipulate trait, you must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the action is lost.
results.11-13: You take [[/r 2d8[persistent,poison]]] damage until you stop raging.
results.20-20: Roll for a second effect. Ignore any rolls that include 1 or 20.

results.1-1: Roll for a second drawback. Ignore any rolls that include 1 or 20.
results.11-13: You can see through lies and deception. You gain the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} spell with a counteract modifier equal to half your level plus your intelligence modifier.
results.20-20: Roll twice and take 2 effects. Ignore any rolls that include 1 or 20.
